sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form, FormGroup, FormLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/loader' import Message from '../components/message' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderScreen() { const { id } = useParams() const orderId = id const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const {order, error, loading} = orderDetails const navigate = useNavigate() if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !==Number(orderId)){ dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [order, orderId]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order: {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Email: {order.user.email}

Shipping to:   {order.shippingAddress.address},   {order.shippingAddress.city},   {order.shippingAddress.zip},   {order.shippingAddress.country}

{ order.IsDelivered ? ( Paid on: {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Payment

Payment Method:   {order.paymentMethod}

{ order.isPaid ? ( Paid on: {order.paidAt} ) : ( Not Paid )}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Your order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} ) }

Order Summary

 Items: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice}
) } export default OrderScreen
